action.msg: STOP YOUR STRUGGLING! YOU TWO WILL FALL BY MY HAND!
Great, so this is where we die.
I'll take some pride in knowing it took a time-traveling robot to take me down.
I love you.
... I love you too.
I was erroneous.
Evidently, the one named Tea is not actually white, they seem to simply have white fur. I was instructed that their skin was white.
I have a lot to learn.
Oh... I guess... it's fine.
You okay, babe?
Yeah, just, really tired. I wanna go home.
Me too. We should probably head back. I'm starving.
Again, the both of you have been assaulted, but you don't seem to be angered. Is this mundane with everyone here?
Mhm. Fever Town is a great place to live.
Sure, there's a lot of weirdos, and crimes a little high...
100% to be exact.
...but there's some genuinely good people here.
I understand. I will report this back home.
Leaving so soon?
I was fit with a task. I have to carry it out.
Sure, but... maybe you could... do it later?
Do it. Later
...I will try this.
You... wanna stay at our place for a bit?
Affirmative. I will learn more about this place. For... research. And go back later.
Sheesh. Real glad things turned out well.
I wonder though... what would have happened if she... they went all out?
Oh well, that's a problem for another me.
